Ingredients.1: 8  fresh morels - trimmed, washed, and dried

Ingredients.4: 1 tablespoon finely chopped red bell pepper

Ingredients.5: 1 tablespoon thinly sliced green onion, including green part

Ingredients.11: 4 dashes hot sauce, or to taste

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Spray a 9x13-inch baking pan with cooking spray.

Directions.2: Chop mushroom stems finely. Cut mushroom caps in half lengthwise; place cut-side up in a 9x13-inch baking pan.

Directions.3: Melt butter in a small skillet over medium heat. Add chopped mushroom stems, red bell pepper, and green onion; cook and stir until green onion is translucent, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat; allow to cool, about 10 minutes.

Directions.4: Mix cream cheese, crabmeat, egg, celery leaves, Worcestershire sauce, hot sauce, and sea salt together in a large bowl. Fold in cooled onion mixture. Place a dollop of filling in each mushroom cap with a small spoon.

Directions.5: Mix bread crumbs and Parmesan cheese together in a small bowl. Sprinkle on top of filled mushroom caps.

Directions.6: Bake in the preheated oven until filling is golden brown, 30 to 35 minutes.
